title: AI-Driven Performance-Centered Instructional Design Simulation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of fundamental instructional design principles and AI technology
context.additional_context: Customized program for current practitioners to enhance AI-assisted instructional design competencies

learning_goals: Learners can analyze causal relationships in instructional design using structural equation modeling (SEM)
Learners can develop performance-based instructional design models utilizing AI tools (e.g., ChatGPT)
Learners can complete projects evaluating the interaction between teacher competencies and AI technologies in simulated environments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
